chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n E t T -> forall (x : nat) (U : ty) (E' : env ty), insert x U E = E' -> j n E' (shift x t) T

Premises:
Inductive j : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j n E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> j n E
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation shift := (lift 1)
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Notation insert x a e := (raw_insert x (Some a) e)
Inductive ty : Set := TyVar : nat -> ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty | TyForall : ty -> ty Arguments TyVar _%nat_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
j_sind : forall P : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P n E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) ->...-> P n e t t0
j_ind : forall P : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P n E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) ->...-> P n e t t0
JTyApp : forall (n m : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T U U' : ty), j m E t (TyForall T) -> m < n -> subst U 0 T = U' -> j n E t U'
j_index_monotonic : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n E t T -> forall m : nat, m >= n -> j m E t T
JTyAbs : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n (map (shift 0) E) t T -> j n E t (TyForall T)
JVar : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j n E (TVar x) T
JApp : forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> j n E (TApp t1 t2) T2
JAbs : forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
subst_subst : forall (t : ty) (k : nat) (v : ty) (s : nat) (w : ty), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)
recognize_subst : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseRelative -> forall traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> ty) -> nat -> ty -> ty, traverse_ = traverse -> forall (v : ty) (k2 k1 : nat) (t : ty), traverse_ (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k2) x) k1 t = subst (lift k1 0 v) (k1 + k2) t
recognize_lift : TraverseRelative -> forall (w k1 k2 : nat) (t : ty) (traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> ty) -> nat -> ty -> ty), traverse_ = traverse -> traverse_ (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k2) x)) k1 t = lift w (k1 + k2) t
rotate = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) (n : nat) (t : T) => subst (var n) 0 (shift (S n) t) : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Lift T -> Subst V T -> nat -> T -> T Arguments rotate {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} _%nat_scope
subst_lift : forall (v : ty) (k : nat) (t : ty), subst v k (shift k t) = t
insert_eq_insert_2 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> forall b : A, insert x b e1 = insert x b e2
subsume_insert_inversion : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 : env A) (x : nat) (a2 : A) (e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 (insert x a2 e2) -> exists (f1 : env A) (a1 : A), e1 = insert x a1 f1 /\ subsume sub f1 e2 /\ sub a1 a2
TraverseVarInjective_term = {| traverse_var_injective := fun (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (H : forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) (t1 : term) => term_ind (fun t2 : term => forall (t3 : term) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t2 = traverse_var f l t3 -> t2 = t3) (fun (n : nat) (t2 : term) => match t2 as t return (forall l : nat, traverse_var f l (TVar n) = traverse_var f l t -> TVar n = t) with | TVar n0 => fun (l : nat) (h : TVar (f l n) = TVar (f l n0)) => let H0 : TVar (f l n0) = TVar (f l n0) -> TVar n = TVar n0 := match h...
expand_subst : forall (v : ty) (k : nat) (t : ty), subst v k t = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2
subst_lift_generalized : forall (n : nat) (v t : ty), subst v n (lift (S n) 0 t) = lift n 0 t
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
TraverseFunctorial_term = {| traverse_functorial := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall l : nat, traverse g l (traverse f l t0) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t0) (fun n l : nat => let H : f l n = f l n := eq_refl in (let H0 : l = l := eq_refl in (let H1 : g = g := eq_refl in (fun (_ : g = g) (_ : l = l) (_ : f l n = f l n) => eq_refl) H1) H0) H) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall l : nat, traverse g l (traverse f l t0) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t0) (...
TraverseVarIsIdentity_term = {| traverse_var_is_identity := fun (f : nat -> nat -> term) (H : forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall l : nat, traverse f l t0 = t0) (fun n l : nat => H l n) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall l : nat, traverse f l t0 = t0) (l : nat) => let H0 : traverse_term f (S l) t0 = t0 := IHt (S l) in (fun H1 : traverse_term f (S l) t0 = t0 => eq_trans (f_equal (fun f0 : term -> term => f0 (traverse_term f (S l) t0)) eq_refl) (f_equal TAbs H1)) H0) (fun (t1 : term) (IHt1 : forall l : nat,...
insert_concat : forall (A : Type) (n x nx : nat) (o : option A) (e1 : env A) (e2 : list A), length e2 = n -> n + x = nx -> raw_insert nx o (concat e1 e2) = concat (raw_insert x o e1) e2
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
insert_concat_replicate : forall (A : Type) (n x nx : nat) (a : option A) (b : A) (e1 : env A), n + x = nx -> raw_insert nx a (concat e1 (replicate n b)) = concat (raw_insert x a e1) (replicate n b)
TraverseRelative_term = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (p : nat) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TVar n) = traverse g l (TVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p...
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
traverse_traverse_var : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> forall (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (g : nat -> nat -> ty) (t : ty) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse_var f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => g l0 (f l0 x)) l t
